tuv.seg: The post-primary or second-level education caters for students aged 12 to 18 years
Freastalaítear ar oideachas daltaí 12 go 18 aois san earnáil iarbhunoideachais
Attendance at school is compulsory for students aged under 16. Most children start in post-primary school at the age of 12 or 13
Is éigeantach freastal ar scoil iarbhunoideachais do mhic léinn atá faoi 16 bliana d’aois
They must be at least 12 years of age on 1 January in the year they start second-level education in order to be registered in a post-primary school
Tosaíonn an chuid is mó de leanaí le hoideachas dara leibhéil (ar a dtugtariarbhunscoil) ag 12 nó 13 bliana d’aois
There are different types of post-primary school
Tá cineálacha éagsúla iar-bhunscoileanna ann
Choosing a post-primary school
Chun scoil iarbhunoideachais a roghnú
In most rural and provincial areas, there is generally one school that is attended by all the students in that area
I gceantair tuaithe agus i mbailte, bíonn scoil amháin ann go ginearálta a bhfreastalaíonn na mic léinn ar fad sa cheantar uirthi
However, some parents and students, especially in large population centres, may have a choice of schools
Is féidir, áfach, go bhfuil rogha scoileanna ag cuid de thuismitheoirí agus mic léinn, go háirithe i gcathracha nó in áiteanna a bhfuil daonra mór iontu
The factors to consider when choosing a school include:
Tá tosca éagsúla anseo ar féidir gur mian leat smaoineamh orthu agus tú ag rogha iar-bhunscoile:
• The admissions policy: This should be described in the school plan, which the school is obliged to publish
• Polasaí iontrála: Ní mór cuir síos a dhéanamh air seo i bplean na scoile, atá ar an scoil a fhoilsiú
• The curriculum: the range of subjects offered by the school
• An Curaclam: réimse ábhar atá a dteagasc ag an scoil
• School discipline: Under the Education (Welfare) Act 2000 (pdf) the board of management is obliged to draw up a code of behaviour for students
• Smachta scoile: Faoi Acht Oideachais (Leas) 2000 ceanglaítear ar an mbord bainistíochta cód iompair a dhréachtú do mhic léinn ar scoil

• Programmes offered: Junior Certificate and Junior Certificate School Programme, Transition Year, established Leaving Certificate, Leaving Certificate Applied, the Leaving Certificate Vocational and other programmes to support personal and social development

• Cláir atá a dtairiscint ag an scoil: Teastas Sóisearach agus Clár Scoile Teastas Sóisearach , Idirbhliain, An Ardteistiméireacht Coitianta, An Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach, Gairmchlár na hArdteistiméireachta agus cláir eile chun tacaíocht a thabhairt d’fhorbairt phearsanta agus sóisialta
• Streaming of students: Streaming students means dividing them into different classes for all subjects from the time they start secondary school, based on the school's assessment of their ability

• Chun mic léinn a shruthú: Ciallaíonn sruthú mac léinn iad a chur i ranganna éagsúla do gach ábhar ón lá a thosaíonn siad ar scoil dara leibhéil, bunaithe ar mheasúnacht na scoile ar a gcumas foghlamtha
• Assessment of students' progress and feedback to parents and students: Checking of students' progress, feedback to parents, arrangements for parent-teacher meetings

• Measúnacht ar dhul chun cinn na mac léinn agus aiseolas do thuismitheoirí agus do mhic léinn: le dul chun cinn na mac léinn a scrúdú, aiseolas do thuismitheoirí, socruithe le haghaidh cruinnithe tuismitheoirí - múinteoirí
• Facilities: What student facilities are provided, for example a library, access to computers, a language laboratory and facilities for lunch, PE and recreation
• Saoráid: Soláthair áiseanna do mhic léinn, mar shampla, leabharlann, rochtain ar ríomhairí, teanglann agus áiseanna do lón, do chorp oideachais agus siamsaíochta
• Support services: guidance counsellor, remedial support for students, pastoral care
• Seirbhísí tacaíochta: comhairleoir gairme, tacaíocht feabhais do mhic léinn, cúram tréadach
• Extra-curricular activities: sports, clubs, debating etc
• Imeachtaí eachtra-churaclam le fáil
• Other factors including the school ethos (details should be in the school plan); student and parental involvement in life of school - whether it has a student council and/or a parents' association

• Tosca eile ina n-áirítear éiteas na scoile (caithfear sonraí bheith i bplean na scoile); páirteachas na mac léinn agus na dtuismitheoirí i saol na scoile – cé acu comhairle na mac léinn nó cumann tuismitheoirí atá ann
Enrolling your child at post-primary school
Chun do leanbh a chlárú in iarbhunscoil
You can send your child to the post-primary school of your choice, provided there is a place available
Is féidir leat do leanbh a chur chuig do rogha iarbhunscoile, ar choinneáil go bhfuil áit ar fáil dó
Where there is an accommodation problem, the school must give priority on the basis of its enrolment policy
Nuair a bhíonn fadhb áite ann, ní mór don scoil tosaíocht a thabhairt ar bhonn a polasaí cláraithe
This is drawn up by the board of management and should be available to you on request
Tá sé seo dréachta ag an mbord bainistíochta agus caithfidh sé a bheith ar fáil ar iarratas
While most post-primary schools are in a position to enrol all children who apply, there is no automatic guarantee of a place in the school you choose
Cé go mbíonn an chuid is mó iarbhunscoileanna in ann gach leanbh a chuireann isteach a chlárú, ní bhíonn uathrathaíocht áite sa scoil áitiúil
Then, you should contact the school of your choice to see if there is a place available
Chun do leanbh a chlárú, ní mór duit liosta iarbhunscoileanna i do cheantar a sheiceáil
The school of your choice may place your child on a waiting list or you may need to contact other schools to find a place
Ina dhiaidh sin, ní mór duit dul i dteagmháil le do rogha scoile le feiceáil an bhfuil áit ar fáil inti
The Department of Education and Skills held a consultation on the options for the regulation of school enrolment
Is féidir le rogha do scoile do leanbh a chur a liosta feithimh nó is féidir go mbeidh ort dul i dteagmháil le scoileanna eile i do cheantar
The vast majority of post-primary schools do not charge fees
Ní ghearrann tromlach mór na n-iarbhunscoileanna táillí
However, students must pay for books and examination fees
Ní mór do mhic léinn íoc as leabhair agus táillí scrúdaithe
In addition, there are other costs, such as school uniform
Ina theannta sin, tá costais eile ann, ar nós éide scoile
There are schemes to help low-income families meet the costs of schooling
Tá scéimeanna ann chun cabhair a thabhairt do theaghlaigh ar ioncam íseal chun costais scolaíochta a ghlanadh
The Department of Education and Skills has published a circular on the weight of schoolbags
Tá ciorclán faoi mheáchan málaí scoile ar fáil ar an suíomh gréasáin den Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
Second-level education consists of a three-year Junior Cycle, followed by a two-year or three-year Senior Cycle
Is é atá san oideachas dara leibhéil ná Córas Sóisearach, agus Córas Sinsearach de dhá bhliana nó thrí bliana ian dhiaidh
The Junior Certificate Programme examination is taken at the end of the Junior Cycle
Déantar scrúdú Clár an Teastais Sóisearaigh ag deireadh Córais Sóisearaigh
In the Senior Cycle, there is an optional one-year Transition Year programme followed by a choice of three Leaving Certificate programmes
Sa Córas Sinsearach, tá clár Idirbhliana roghnach ar fáil, a leantar le rogha idir thrí Clár Ardteistiméireachta
Each of these 3 Leaving Certificate programmes - the Established Leaving Certificate, the Leaving Certificate Applied and the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme - is a two-year programme
Is clár dhá bhliain gach ceann de na trí chlár Teastas Ardteistiméireachta – an Ardteistiméireacht Choitianta, an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach agus an Ardteistiméireacht Ghairmiúil
Other aspects of post-primary education include:
Áirítear gnéithe eile oideachais iarbhunscoile:
• Education for students with special educational needs
• Oideachas do mhic léinn a bhfuil riachtanais oideachais speisialta acu
• Equipment grants for students with disabilities
• Socruithe do mhic léinn atá faoi mhíchumas
• School transport for post-primary students
• Socruithe speisialta oideachais don lucht taistil
• Special educational arrangements for Travellers
• Bearta chun tabhairt faoi míbhuntáistí oideachais
• Measures to address educational disadvantage
• Cláir do dhaoine nach bhfuil Béarla acu
• Resources for non-English speakers
• Do roghanna agus tú ag fágáil na scoile in Éirinn
